abstract: Google gives a first look at what Google Phones based on the Android software will look like. Think iPhone.
snippet: Google gives a first look at what Google Phones based on the Android software will look like. Think iPhone.
lead_paragraph: O.K. There is no Google Phone. As we wrote a while back, Google is not building a phone. Instead, the company has teamed up with others in the wireless industry to create an open-source operating system, as well as other services, for mobile phones. Other companies, including Motorola, LG and Samsung, are expected to build phones based on this software.

headline.main: A First Look at the Google Phone
